captions.text: I was outside cuttin up bike tires with my grandson
forty hundred police vehicles came bookin
they went busted up in that weird old white dude's house
he had a cult up in there
white dudes hold the record for creepy crimes
but females are strong as hell
but females are strong as hell / unbreakable!
but females are strong as hell
they come out the hole lookin round
like a bunch of Punxsutawney Phils
and I said, "Nathan, IS THIS FOR REALS?!?!"
but females are strong as hell / unbreakable!

they alive, dammit!
but females are strong as hell!
is from our new favorite comedy show
and you can watch more of us, too
(if that's somethin that you'd like to do)

comments.author: Melody Morgan

comments.text:
Just finished watching the the first season of this show , Had a really 
strong start very enjoyable first few episode then it just slowly fizzled 
out into a very poor ending with a detestible Jon Hamm character (not sure 
if it was the writing or the acting on that character) and a horrifying 
Tina Fey character that may as well been a white guy in black face eating 
water melon as it was just painful to watch the scenes she was in. The 
shows most standout feature is Ellie Kemper she is such a loveable 
character as Kimmy Schmidt and anytime her and Tituss Burgess share a scene 
its always the highlight of the episode. Really just felled like a 
unsatisfying ending wrapping up the introduction to the series rather than 
show any sort of character development for Kimmy who's status didn't change 
since episode 1 , same job , no boyfriend (wtf happened to that tutor she 
kissed & broke up with then he vanished like smoke for the rest of the 
season) and still trying to build her life. best I could give it was 3/5 
you'll get hooked into binge watching it and falling in love with the 
characters but it really is sitcom writing where everything is established 
in episode 1 and all problems get solved by the next episode with little no 
carry on story arch.﻿

comments.text:
Translation for PT/BR
A Indestrutível Kimmy Schmidt
Eu estava do lado de fora, cortando pneus de bicicleta com meu neto, 
quando, do nada
Quatro mil carros de policia vieram voando
Eles foram e invadiram a casa daquele velho esquisito
Ele tinha uma seita lá dentro
O cara tá detido por uns crimes bizarros
Mas as mulheres são fortes pra caramba.

Indestrutível!
Elas estão vivas, caramba!
É um milagre!
Indestrutível!
Elas estão vivas, caramba!
As mulheres são fortes pra caramba
Indestrutível!
Elas estão vivas, caramba!
É um milagre!
Indestrutível!
Elas estão vivas, caramba!
As mulheres são fortes pra caramba!

Nós estamos vivemos aqui por 10 anos,
Ninguém viu garota nenhuma
Ninguém ouviu garota nenhuma
Ninguém sentiu o cheiro de garota nenhuma

Ele ás tinha no subsolo
Elas saíram do buraco, olhando em volta
Iguais a um monte de marmotas
E eu disse, ''nathan, é serio isso?!''
Uma, duas, três, quatro garotas saíram
Uma, duas, três, quatro garotas saíram﻿
